# Read in Data
```{r}
df <- readxl::read_excel("tesco.xlsx", sheet = "Order Data")

df %>% 
  group_by(`Customer Name`) %>% 
  summarize(count = n_distinct(`Order ID`)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count))
  
```
